item.title: Tree and paving, 9th June
item.description:
Please could the tree be removed. I am forever cutting it back as it hits the telephone cable. Lifting the pavement, had so many repairs, bottom of driveway looks like a patchwork quit from all repairs. Please remove tree and fix all paving. 58 west hallowes

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Hallowes, Middle Park, London

item.title: 9 nitrous oxide gas bottles near our premises gate, 9th June
item.description:
I found these this morning, Monday 09 June at 09:28am. After looking online, it appears they should be classified as hazardous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newington Butts, Elephant and Castle, London

item.title: NW67BR cul se sac, 9th June
item.description:
This huge tree at the side of the cul de sac on council land is overgrown and overlapping my garden and permitting squirrel access. Please could you prune/reduce size as overgrown also the street trees need to be pruned as cause insurance issues otherwise. The back alley also needs attention as overgrown. Many thanks for support

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brondesbury Park, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Safety barriers not removed weeks after work completed, 9th June
item.description:
Workmen arrived weeks ago to resurface part of the footpath in front of 110/112 Woodyates Road. They set up a small enclosure on the road for the waste material/rubble etc. The waste was removed when the work was completed, but the barriers were not removed. They have been there for weeks now. They cause an obstruction to traffic and are an invitation for people to dump rubbish inside them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodyates Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Human excrement on wall, 9th June
item.description:
Poo has been on wall outside the entryway to the building for 1 month now and has not been cleaned after several calls to report it. There is a discarded tissue there and now an accumulation of big stones and debris. As we enter property, fly's are enterin
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Land Rear of 75/77 Broadway Market, 9th June
item.description:
